ComicInfo.Summary: A Cold Day in Hell: Sara and Jake investigate a murder where the victim has a demonic Pez dispenser embedded in his heart containing a special message for Sara. Siry wants to take Sara off the case since it seems to be personally directed at her, but the captain disagrees and keeps her involved.
ComicInfo.Tags: Joe Siry,New York Police Department,New York City,New York State,Sara Pezzini,Witchblade,Jake McCarthy,Kilby
ComicInfo.Title: A Cold Day in Hell
